verses.refrain: Be like Jesus, this my song, In the home and in the throng; Be like Jesus, all day long! I would be like Jesus.
verses.verse: He has broken every fetter, I would be like Jesus; That my soul may serve Him better, I would be like Jesus.
All the way from earth to glory, I would be like Jesus; Telling o'r and o'r the story, I would be like Jesus.
That in heaven He may meet me, I would be like Jesus; That His words "Well done" may greet me, I would be like Jesus. Would be like Jesus.
